timeline.message:
removed code from old approach
refs: https://github.com/metasfresh/metasfresh/issues/6713

timeline.bodyText:
pls introduce I_DD_OrderLine IDDOrderDAO.getLineById(int ddOrderLineId) and use it here.
Avoid direct InterfaceWrapperHelper.load calls outside of repository/DAO.
timeline.author: teosarca
teosarca

timeline.bodyText: createHUEditorView would be  better than openHUEditor because it's not opening the view.
timeline.author: teosarca
teosarca

timeline.bodyText: extract Services.get(IHandlingUnitsDAO.class) as a class field (i.e. handlingUnitsDAO)
timeline.author: teosarca
teosarca

replies.bodyText: also can we use a sysconfig instead of hardconding it?
replies.author: teosarca

replies.bodyText: that's not a HUPIItemProductId, is an ad_val_rule_id, I know, bad naming 🤦
replies.author: pvpurcarcosmin

timeline.author: teosarca
teosarca

timeline.bodyText:
pls consider extracting the logic from this method and introduce
int IDDOrderBL.addLine(DDOrderLineCreateRequest request)
which basically creates the dd order line and returns the DD_OrderLine_ID.
Ideally, DDOrderLineQuickInputProcessor shall contain glue code.... as much as possbile.
timeline.author: teosarca

timeline.bodyText:
this method is pointless because warehouseBL.getDefaultLocatorId(warehouseId) never returns null.
better, let's annotate warehouseBL.getDefaultLocatorId(warehouseId) with @NonNull
see org.adempiere.warehouse.api.impl.WarehouseBL.getDefaultLocatorId(WarehouseId) which is creating the locator if missing.
timeline.author: teosarca
teosarca
teosarca
